post:
Hello all, 

Glad to announce on today big date that we offer low cost FTP backup: https://www.robovps.biz/backup-service/
Port speed is 1 Gbit. Traffic is free on "fair play" terms. 

Also, we offer instant server R730XD Dell 2x Intel Xeon E5-2630v4 / 128 GB RAM / 4x960GB SSD + 1x4TB SATA with H/W RAID 1 Gbit port and 30 Tb traffic for 139€ per month. 
iDRAC access and server management panel included for free. Additional IPv4 address - 1€ per month. You can check our offers on this page https://www.robovps.biz/dedicated_servers_in_germany/ 

We accept cards, PayPal, Paysera, Webmoney, PerfectMoney, Yandex, QIWI and crypto currencies.
